alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 2:22PM PST until January 17 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 1500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Cascade mountains and valleys of Whatcom and Skagit Counties, including Maple Falls, the Mount Baker Ski Area, Newhalem, Lyman, and Concrete. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another round of light mountain snow and freezing rain is expected on Thursday into Thursday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Cascades and Passes
